content.details: Successfully merged both TASK-007 and TASK-008 feature branches into main. Files now available at /agent_runner.py and /simulation/task_handlers.py. Both tasks marked as Done in TASK_CARDS.md.

Successfully reviewed and merged all PRs for TASK-009, TASK-010, and TASK-011. All files in place: /tests/test_agent_flow.py, updated /agent_runner.py with --init, and /tools/task_dispatcher.py. All tasks marked as Done in TASK_CARDS.md.

All outstanding PRs from Phase 1 sprint (TASK-012 to TASK-014) have been reviewed and merged. TASK-012 (central router), TASK-013 (inbox monitor), and TASK-014 (outbox visualizer) are now in main branch. All changes pushed to origin/main.

metadata.git_status: main branch fully synced with origin

content.details: Completed TASK-018: Rewritten and renumbered TASK_CARDS.md to fix task numbering conflicts. Moved TASK-011 through TASK-014 to completed section and renumbered future tasks starting from TASK-019. Organized backlog into Phase 2-4 with expanded descriptions. Ready for review.

changes: Added TASK-011 to TASK-014 as completed
Renumbered backlog tasks starting from TASK-019

content.details: Completed TASK-023C: Integrated agent learning into system execution. Added --use-learning flag to agent_runner.py, performance checking with warnings, and learning-based routing in router.py. Task logs now track when learning is applied.

changes: Integrated learning data loading and performance checking
Added learning_applied tracking to task logs

content.details: Phase 2 routing and monitoring complete! Successfully merged TASK-029 (router with TTL/retry) and TASK-030 (task status tracker). All PRs reviewed and merged. Main branch updated with enhanced routing and monitoring capabilities.

features_added: Router with TTL and retry support
metadata.git_status: All PRs merged and main branch updated

content.details: Implemented dependency-aware execution in agent_runner.py. Added dependency checking with depends_on metadata support, deferred execution for unmet dependencies, comprehensive logging in task_log.md, and --force flag to override checks. Ready for review.

features_implemented: Check depends_on metadata in task messages
Search outboxes and task logs for completed dependencies
Add --force flag to bypass dependency checks

content.details: Phase 3 Intelligent Routing Layer complete! Successfully merged all pending PRs. Includes dependency-aware execution (TASK-031), context awareness framework (TASK-022/merged as PR #9), and error recovery/fallback routing (TASK-032). Tagged milestone v1.1.0-intelligent-routing.

features_added: Context awareness with persistent agent memory
Error recovery and fallback task routing
metadata.git_status: All changes merged and pushed to main

content.details: Phase 3.5 Learning & Optimization Layer is now complete. Successfully merged all 3 learning-related PRs (#10, #13, #14), consolidated task tracking, and finalized the learning infrastructure implementation. Created production tag v1.2.0 marking this major milestone.

Completed TASK-033D: Successfully reviewed and merged Phase 3.5 orchestration components. All TASK-033 subtasks (033A, 033B, 033C) were found to be properly implemented and committed. Created single commit consolidating all orchestration features into main branch.

Successfully reviewed and merged all Phase 4 sprint 1 PRs. TASK-034 updated roadmap, TASK-035 added retry/fallback logic and included TASK-036 execution summary tool. All changes merged to main and pushed to origin.
